# William Bernstein Schwartz Jr.

William Bernstein Schwartz Jr. (November 14, 1921 â€“ May 18, 2010) was an American businessman who served as the United States Ambassador to the Bahamas from 1977 to 1981.
Schwartz died on May 18, 2010, in Atlanta, Georgia, at the age of 88.
